name: MechaShift
description:
Press R to reset the level.

Roll, teleport and rocket-jump your way through the city with this unstable, makeshift robot!

MechaShift is a versatile platformer game in which the player controls a robot with special movement abilities. Due to its highly unstable nature, however, these powers can't be utilized excessively - at least not without consequences.

This game was created for Ludum Dare 49, and was developed in Godot.
Link: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/49/mechashift

CREDITS
André Bariani: Sound Design
Dan Isamu (MisterProject): Programming
Anderson Garrote: Art Direction
